/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are adorned with vibrant red and yellow banners, adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome cityscape. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and pedestrians going about their day, contributing to the dynamic energy of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban environment below. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, hinting at a touch of nature amidst the concrete jungle.
